seo-titles-metadata.question: Which product(s) are we optimizing titles and metadata for today?
Are there specific keywords, phrases or brand terms you want to include?

expansion-kit.question: List the product names or SKUs you want us to write descritions for.
Who is your ideal customer for these products (age, interests, use case, etc.)?

conversion-booster.question: What common objections or hesitations do customers express before buying?
What features, benefits, or advantages should we emphasize to build trust?

launch-kit.question: How would you describe your brand's personality or tone (e.g., bold, caring, playful)?
What makes your business different, exciting, or memorable to customers?

faq-section.question: What are the top questions your customers ask before purchasing?
Are there any must-include answers, details, or support policies you want us to mention?

product-description.question: What product are we writing about, and why do customers love it?
Would you like us to match a specific tone or writing style?

product-overview.question: What does this product do at a glance, and who is it for?
What key details or benefits absolutely must be included?

welcome-email.question: What feeling or impression do you want new customers to get when they first join you?
Is there anything you want to highlight, like your values, unique offers, or brand mission?

product-drop-email.question: What product are we announcing, and what's exciting or new about it?
Should we include urgency, exclusivity, or a special offer to drive clicks?

seo-optimized-blog-post.question: What topic or keyword(s) should we focus this blog post on?
What's the main takeaway or call to action you want readers to leave with?

bullet-point-rewrite.question: Paste your current bullet points below so we can help imrove them.
What tone or approach should we use in the new version (e.g., persuasive, playful, formal)?

comparison-table.question: What products, services, or options are we comparing?
What comparison points matter most to your customers (features, price, quality, etc.)?

full-site-audit.question: Do you want us to focus on SEO, conversions, user experience, or all of the above?
